::::decidePercentage { {portSpeed 100} {frameSize 64} {frameRate default} }

################################################################# Procedure Name: decidePercentage Description: Decide the ixia percentage given portSpeed, FrameSize, & frameRate Input args: {portSpeed} {frameSize} {frameRate} Output args: none Typical usage: set percentage [decidePercentage $txSpeed $frameSize $frameRate] Category: Utility #################################################################

::::getObjToModify { type arg val sb }

::::getStreamLoadProfile { name }

::::modifyStream { sb type arg val port }

::::saveExisitngStreams { portlist }

########################################################################################## Name : saveExisitingStreams { portlist} Description : retrieves the exisiting streams on the port and changes there state to disable portn: on the given port portn, CURRENT_STREAM_ARRAY : global variable which saves current stream for each port The calling proc will add the new stream at CURRENT_STREAM_ARRAY return value : -1 there is problems in configuring the stream : 1 the streams are successfully configured typical usage: saveExisitingStreams [list "1 2 3"] ##########################################################################################
